@runefreak10 wrote:

What’s this about?

9d n 1 n e:

ROFL delta, ahahahah. delta is shit mk. this is zdr learn your servers before judging gtfo my thread kid.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 10:04:11 pm[/size][hr]and if i leech go find me a source with my exact codings and ill remove this mmk. otherwise, gtfo and code your delta crap.

Just 4 days ago he was hating delta… Now he likes it? Wha…?

item.title: Need help making/fixing ::hail
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:16, topic:279269”][quote author=9d n 1 n e link=topic=368584.msg2791223#msg2791223 date=1242777890]

ll at that code.

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourusername")) { hail(); }

i can laugh all i want ahahah that code fails. I know what im takling about mk?

well then he should go use delta then.

Fuck Delta and fuck you. Delta = shit. I would like to sharpie ‘dumbass’ on the back of my hand backwards and smack you across the face while it’s still wet and leave it stamped there. You don’t know… What the fuck… You are talking about, sir.

your a funny kid, your a fail. these forums are fail. delta owns. people like YOU who say its shit is TO LAZY to fix it up so gtfo lazy kid. When you’ve coded delta even near as mine, then you can talk shit. until then, go die.
[/quote]

Your grammar is a fail. I would love to see you do even half the shit I’ve done. How the fuck would you saying “then he should use delta” fix his problem? The command you gave him wouldn’t have done shit if he didn’t have a hail() method. But you’re too fucking dumb to comprehend and realize that, so instead you tell him to switch to delta. You probably don’t even know what a fucking method is, and you calling me lazy for pointing out your retardness makes you, yes you guessed right, a fucking retard. I like these forums so I won’t ‘gtfo’. You think these forums are a fail? Then you ‘gtfo’ and take your 12-year old attitude with you. When you can back your shit up without sounding like an idiot, ‘then you can talk shit’. Until then, no.[/quote]
I don’t think he knows what calling a method is.

ChaosPkers:

9d n 1 n e - Your an idiot… Telling him to switch sources? What if he’s done a lot of work on that one, and doesn’t want to switch.

I’m pretty sure 9d n 1 n e switches sources when he gets an error from the compiler.

Error: ‘Unclosed string literal’ … Switch

item.title: Need help making/fixing ::hail
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“vamp256, post:13, topic:279269”][quote]if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}[/quote]
Thats command.

[quote]public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “ALL HAIL “+playerName+”!”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}[/quote]
Thats the public void[/quote]
You mean that’s the method.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making/fixing ::hail
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); }
Thats command.
public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
Thats the public void
